mapper.insert:

company_id,
typeId,
name,
report_object,

expected_year_money_start,

mapper.update:
UPDATE zp_company_job_info
company_id=#{companyId},
typeId=#{typeId},
name=#{name},
report_object=#{reportObject},
jobPositionLevelId=#{jobPositionLevelId},
zp_person_count=#{zpPersonCount},
expected_year_money_start=#{expectedYearMoneyStart},
expected_year_money_end=#{expectedYearMoneyEnd},
work_term_start=#{workTermStart},
work_term_end=#{workTermEnd},
down_team_person_count=#{downTeamPersonCount},
zp_require=#{zpRequire},
sex=#{sex},
educationId=#{educationId},
englishLevelId=#{englishLevelId},
age_start=#{ageStart},
age_end=#{ageEnd},
marital_id=#{maritalId},
topSpecialty=#{topSpecialty},
job_tempt_text=#{jobTemptText},
job_tempt_item=#{jobTemptItem},
`desc`=#{desc},
more_desc=#{moreDesc},
in_person=#{inPerson},
in_datetime=#{inDatetime},
last_update_time=#{lastUpdateTime},
is_delete=#{isDelete},
zp_urgency_status_id=#{zpUrgencyStatusId},
area_id=#{areaId},
WHERE job_id=#{jobId}
mapper.select:
SELECT zp_company_job_info.job_id, zp_company_job_info.company_id, zp_company_job_info.typeId, zp_company_job_info.name, zp_company_job_info.report_object, zp_company_job_info.jobPositionLevelId, zp_company_job_info.zp_person_count, zp_company_job_info.expected_year_money_start, zp_company_job_info.expected_year_money_end, zp_company_job_info.work_term_start, zp_company_job_info.work_term_end, zp_company_job_info.down_team_person_count, zp_company_job_info.zp_require, zp_company_job_info.sex, zp_company_job_info.educationId, zp_company_job_info.englishLevelId, zp_company_job_info.age_start, zp_company_job_info.age_end, zp_company_job_info.marital_id, zp_company_job_info.topSpecialty, zp_company_job_info.job_tempt_text, zp_company_job_info.job_tempt_item, zp_company_job_info.desc, zp_company_job_info.more_desc, zp_company_job_info.in_person, zp_company_job_info.in_datetime, zp_company_job_info.last_update_time, zp_company_job_info.is_delete,
zp_company_job_demand_keys.key_id as k_key_id ,
zp_company_job_demand_keys.job_id as k_job_id,
zp_company_job_demand_keys.keyword as k_keyword,
zp_company_job_demand_keys.proportion as k_proportion,
zp_company_job_info.zp_urgency_status_id,
zp_company_job_info.area_id,
zp_company_info.company_id AS companyAreaId
FROM zp_company_job_info LEFT JOIN zp_company_job_demand_keys ON zp_company_job_info.job_id= zp_company_job_demand_keys.job_id LEFT JOIN zp_company_info ON zp_company_job_info.company_id =zp_company_info.company_id
WHERE zp_company_job_info.job_id=#{jobId}
